Translations.Text: Recall ti ni dir al angxel, Fal prostrate Adam. Ili fal prostrate Satan; li rifuz
Ni tiam dir O Adam this est enemy de vi your wife. Ne let him evict vi Paradise lest vi igx miserable
Vi garanti neniam hunger therein nor ir unsheltered
Nor vol vi soif therein nor sufer any hejt
Diabl flustr him dir O Adam let me montr vi arb eternity unending kingship
Ili mangx el gxi, whereupon their korp igx visible al them ili pen kovr foli Paradise! Adam tiel disobeyed his Lord fal
Subsequently his Lord chose him redeemed him direkt him
Li dir Ir down therefrom all da vi! Vi est enemies de 1 another When guidance ven vi Me anyone sekv My guidance ne ir astray nor sufer any mizer
As por 1 who disregards My message li hav amiserable life ni resurrect him Tag Resurrection blind
Li dir My Lord do gxi vi summon me blind when mi did uz est seer
Li dir vi forges our revelations when ili ven vi vi tuj forges
Ni tiel requite those transgress rifuz kred en revelations their Lord retribution Hereafter est far mav everlasting
Gxi Does ever occur them kiel many previous generaci ni annihilated Ili tuj marsx hejm de those antaux them. These est sign those posed intelligence
